column4: I was wondering, for someone who wants to start from scratch learning UNBUNTU/Linux in general (desktop, DNS, DHCP, etc etc) what book would you recommend?  The "BIBLE" editions or the Orange "Unleashed" types?
Like Ubuntu Unleashed 2011 edition?
it depends on what you mean by "from scratch"
i like the O'Reilly book, Robbins and Beebe's "Classic Shell Scripting"
